techmeme.title: 11xAI, which builds AI bots that help automate end-to-end workflows, raised a $24M Series A led by Benchmark and says it is nearing ARR of $10M (Dominic-Madori Davis/TechCrunch)
Musk posted "no one is even trying to assassinate Biden/Kamala 🤔" after Trump's apparent assassination attempt, then deleted the false claim, calling it a joke (Flynn Nicholls/Newsweek)
Microsoft debuts new AI coding tools in Excel, adds email prioritization Outlook features, and says Copilot's customer base grew 60%+ in the most recent quarter (Bloomberg)
Microsoft launches Copilot Pages, which brings Copilot responses to a new page where they can be edited collaboratively, coming to Microsoft 365 Copilot today (Tom Warren/The Verge)
Synchron says its brain implant now lets people with paralysis use Alexa without voice or physical interaction, along with iPhones and other devices (Emily Mullin/Wired)
